alert.note: Alert for Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Eastern Highland; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 23 at 4:57AM EST until December 24 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...In Virginia, Eastern Highland County, and Northern Virginia Blue Ridge and Central Virginia Blue Ridge. In West Virginia, Eastern Pendleton County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest wind speeds will be through this evening. Affects from the extreme cold could be made worse due to power outages.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Eastern Highland; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge
